document_data.name: Amaril Sweetwater
document_data.mainbody: '''Amaril Sweetwater''' was a [[half-elf]] and former [[adventurer]] whose travels eventually led her to [[Elventree]]. She liked the sylvan community so much that she decided to stay.
document_data.Personality: Amaril had a quick temper and took a long time to cool off once angered.
document_data.Activities: Amaril owned the [[Gold Cave]]â€”a natural cave in Elventree that she converted into a general shop. As a former adventurer, she had a good idea of the equipment her former brethren required and kept her store stocked accordingly.
